column1: Kontagora is a major town on the south bank of the Kontagora River in north-west Niger State
column2: Nigeria. It is the capital city of the Kontagora Emirate.

column1: The Niger state governor also come from Kontagora.

column3: the Roman Catholic Apostolic Vicariate of Kontagora was established here.  St Michael's Cathedral is the seat of the apostolic vicar.
